xmlrpc Module¶

class django_eracks.apps.bloglets.xmlrpc.SafeXMLRPCView(allow_none=False, encoding=None)¶

Bases: SimpleXMLRPCServer.SimpleXMLRPCDispatcher

class SafeXMLRPCView

Checks for “public” attribute on callables before calling them.

system_listMethods()¶

system.listMethods() => [‘add’, ‘subtract’, ‘multiple’]

Returns a list of the methods supported by the server.

django_eracks.apps.bloglets.xmlrpc.list_public_methods(obj)¶

django_eracks.apps.bloglets.xmlrpc.resolve_dotted_attribute(obj, attr, allow_dotted_names=True)¶

resolve_dotted_attribute(a, ‘b.c.d’) => a.b.c.d

Similar to the one in SimpleXMLRPCServer, except that it tries converting dots to underscores, too.
